meanings.definition: A male child or young man.
meanings.sent1: The boyla played with his toy car.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of boyla playing soccer in the park.

meanings.definition: To make something or someone appear more boyish.
meanings.sent1: She decided to boyla her outfit by adding a baseball cap.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a boy or young man.
meanings.sent1: Come here, my little boyla, let me give you a hug.
meanings.sent2: Grandma always calls me her special boyla when I visit.
